ch.aplu.turtle

Class Options

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.aplu.turtle.Options

  • public class Options
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to select initializing options for the ch.aplu.turtle package. Option set here take precedence over values set in the turtlegraphics.properties file.

    • Method Detail

      • setClosingMode

        public static void setClosingMode(java.lang.String mode)
        Determines what happens when the title bar close button is hit. Library value: TerminateOnClose
        Values:
        TermintateOnClose -> Terminating and shutting down JRE by System.exit(0)
        ClearOnClose -> Remove all turtle images and traces, but turtles remain where they are
        AskOnClose -> Show confirmation dialog asking for termination
        DisposeOnClose -> Closes the graphics window, but does not shutdown JRE
        ReleaseOnClose -> Like DisposeOnClose, but throws runtime exception when turtle graphics methods are called
        NothingOnClose -> Do nothing

      • setFrameTitle

        public static void setFrameTitle(java.lang.String title)
        Default title displayed in the frame title bar. Library value: Java Turtle Playground.

      • setPlaygroundSize

        public static void setPlaygroundSize(int width,
                     int height)
        Default size of playground (width, height). Library default: 400 x 400. width and height should be even positive integers. Determines the span of turtle coordinates (-width/2 .. width/2, -height/2 .. height/2) and the number of pixels (width + 1) x (height + 1)

      • setFramePosition

        public static void setFramePosition(int ulx,
                    int uly)
        Default position of frame (ulx, uly). Library value: adapted to current screen size and number of playgrounds shown.

      • setBackgroundColor

        public static void setBackgroundColor(java.awt.Color bgColor)
        Default background color of playground. Library value: Color.white.

      • setTurtleColor

        public static void setTurtleColor(java.awt.Color turtleColor)
        Default color of the turtle shape. Library value: Color.cyan.

      • setPenColor

        public static void setPenColor(java.awt.Color penColor)
        Default pen color. Library value: Color.blue.

      • setTurtleSpeed

        public static void setTurtleSpeed(int speed)
        Default turtle speed used for animation. Library value: 200 pixels / secs.

      • setAngleResolution

        public static void setAngleResolution(int resolution)
        Default angle resolution used for animation. Library value: 72 degrees / secs.

      • setFramesPerSecoonds

        public static void setFramesPerSecoonds(int nbFrames)
        Default frames per second used for animation. Library value: 10 frames / secs.

      • setEdgeBehavior

        public static void setEdgeBehavior(java.lang.String behavior)
        Default behavior when the turtle reaches the edge of the playground. Library value: clip. Values: clip or wrap
